entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers early this morning. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 23. Humidex 25. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
